tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting this clinic for the past 15 years for my regular checkups & dental issues. The Dentist in this clinic are highly knowledgeable & expert in their field. Therefore,  you are rest assured that you are in safe  hands . This clinic is  NABH accredited , which means it follows all safety & clinical norms that ensures  patient‚Äôs well-being.
The  entire team is professional & well-trained , which guarantees timely response & excellent communication at all times..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hi,I am Sai Ali,
Visited Dr.Ishwari Bhirud for severe tooth ache and Root canal treatment in Covid times.
I was very comfortable to follow safety protocol given in this Covid Compliant clinic.
Single sitting Root canal was done with disposable Root canal tip instruments. Though I had to pay for it,It was for my safety .
I was absolutely comfortable with the treatment.
The most important thing is I liked transparency in the treatment and billing. Every thing was explained to me till I understood.
I am grateful to the Care32 Family Dental Care team for giving me comfortable treatment & ambiance.
I strongly recommend this clinic for safe treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been going to their team of doctors for last several years and I am very happy about all the dental treatment that I had to undergo.Their range of treatment for all dental problems is very good, particularly their use of latest technologies . Overall,it has been a very happy experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Promptly attended after meticulous  checking, screening health condition & fulfilling all sanitisation protocol in very clean & detailed manner matching to present Corona  threatening situation. The whole environment is maintained in healthy & comfortable manner congenial to patients/visitors. I would recommend any body to avail the treatment here confidently. Krishna Chandra Patnaik

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited doctor for Wisdom tooth extraction, general dental checkup and treatment for sensitivity. I had really nice experience, I would suggest Dr Ishwari and her team because of their expertise,  careful attitude, timely and well explained treatment. They truly means a family dentistry where you can get complete dental care with ease of appointment and complete treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: post initial advise of two visit for cleaning ,Dr Ishwari advised for cavity filling .But on the procedure day the other doctor has done the filling of tooth ***** *** *** ******** ********* **********Also she suggested for extraction. ***** ** *********** wastage of time and money

tags: None
review:
Very good experience,  Care32 Family Dental Care Center  team took excellent care and dealed  with my anxiety ,. Now have confidences and shall get my teeth treated and replaced.
I appreciate painless root canal treatment and even painless extraction done here.

tags: None
review:
I had multiple dental problems, Had neglected dental hygiene,
Dr.Ishwari and her team took total dental care gently ,Root canals, restorations,extractions, Implants, Gum treatment Implants all was painless.and now I can smile and chew well. My self confidence has improved,now a days I don't avoid meeting people.
Thanks to Dr.Ishwari and Care32Dental team for giving me happiness  back in my life.

tags: None
review: I had missing teeth in both upper and lower Jaw. chewing food was great challenge.Dr.Ishwari and her team did fantastic job on my teeth restored my remaining teeth, maintained my gum health and gave me fixed and removable teeth. Now I can chew my food got into better digestion. I have improved facial look and speech. I am really touched with the efforts Dr.Ishwari took to treat my bad dental condition. I am greatful to all team members too.

tags: None
review: Quite good, but repetitive visits for the same tooth can get quite annoying. Also while we do get appointments punctuality could be an issue as there are certain clients who tend to walk in at random moments and are also surprisingly attended to as they happen to be family friends. Also since it's a multi specialty clinic certain doctors walk in at random times and coordinate their patients in between of certain other appointments, that is quite unprofessional as time is precious to all.
